text:
Message 547 of 4024
That seems fair and sounds like an awesome solution. I think we will both feel better this way. Thanks for addressing it so quickly as it gave us both
concerns. Please take time to review the add-ons. And I am more than happy to help you pick the right data plan. I made some great choices here and
would be happy to share with you so you find the right solution at the right price! Just let me know if I can do anything!
Sent:01/19/2024 at 03:44 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/19/2024 at 03:47 PM)
Subject:Re: Kirkland xfinity account
Message 548 of 4024
Hmmm... you have been in OFW to send mails but you are not checking or responding to my concerns about treating Adrian’s mental health. Please
take a moment to consider that we both should work together on mental health issues just like a decision we would make in an emergency room
setting. Can we work together?
Sent:01/19/2024 at 03:46 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/19/2024 at 03:47 PM)
Subject:Re: Please unblock
Message 549 of 4024
I’m managing work and changing accounts.
I can reach out to Dr Brien or you can. Just lmk as I would like this to get kicked off quickly
Sent:01/19/2024 at 03:49 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/19/2024 at 03:54 PM)
Subject:Re: Please unblock
Message 550 of 4024
So... that is actually the definition of a unilateral ultimatum. I don’t want to do that. That is not the way we are expected to behave as genetic parents.
If you are going to proceed that way of course I am strongly frowning on the omnipotent power play suggestion.
And I recognize you are balancing his mental health with your work. I guess something has to give. But I’d still like to be involved just like if we are
deciding to remove his appendix. So please let me know if you can make the time to discuss. Hopefully you will free up for a moment soon. I’ll make
it work on my end.
Sent:01/19/2024 at 03:59 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/19/2024 at 04:02 PM)
Subject:Re: Please unblock
